name: Feedback
body:
Feedback is a Component for the Phalcon PHP framework.  It is intended to be used as a replacement for Phalcon's built-in _Flash_ and _Message_ functionalities.

##Quick example##
**Create a message**  

```php
Feedback::error('The model could not be saved');
```

**Retrieve messages**  

```php
Feedback::getError();
```

More detailed examples, information, and documentation can be found in the [Wiki](https://github.com/quasipickle/feedback/wiki).

Released under the [MIT license](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/quasipickle/feedback/master/LICENSE)
